column4: kindly help me get back my GUI. It tries to start in Low Graphic Mode but never starts n falls to CLI.Kernel was updated last week
is it ok to install 9.1 to replace earlier Lynx
ok pksadiq
tq
ok.trying
I got this message Job already running gdm
im on live CD 9.1
ok
if Im on damaged system I cant chat
if I can chat then I will go to damaged system
do you mean reformat?
that'd be fine but why would you install 9.10?
because I lost GUI after last kernel update
i remember when that happened to me on 9.10. :p
whats the way out then
to me the easiest way out of any problem is to format. i keep everything backed up so it takes me like an hour to completely reinstall on one of my systems. i'd say format and install 10.10.
but  will my ealier drives will b visible from live CD
yes. you can access them from the live cd. you have to mount them. then you can take the data you need and transfer it to an external harddrive or something.
i.e. copy your home folder to an external drive so you can copy files back over to your new install.
ok.im trying
i would suggest installing 10.04 or 10.10 but in the installer just tell it to use the entire disk. be sure you backed up any files that you need though.
